channel.title: Route 53 and ACM :: My Hugo Site
channel.description: PHASE 2: DOMAIN & SECURITY PREPARATION (ROUTE 53 & ACM) Before creating the CloudFront distribution, the domain name system (DNS) and SSL certificates must be properly prepared. Step 2.1: Create a Hosted Zone (If Not Exists) Navigate to Amazon Route 53 â†’ Hosted zones. If the domain sgutodolist.com does not exist in the list: Click Create hosted zone. Domain name: sgutodolist.com Type: Public hosted zone Click Create. Update Name Servers at the domain provider (This project uses a domain purchased from a third-party registrar.)
